name: HONCi-Tonk!
description:
A puzzle game prototype where you form covalent bonds between elements to create compounds. 

Controls:

LMB: Dragging, forming bonds

RMB: Deleting bonds

ESC/ENTER: Pause

Made during RamHacks2020 9/26/2020 - 9/27/2020

GitHub: https://github.com/juliawang2014/HONCi-Tonk
